page.title: 10 THE PAST PRESENT CONT'D
page.content: TO SUBSTANTIATE THIS,AND LUDDINGTON, ASTON CANTLOW AND BISHOPTON BOASTS THE SAME CLAIM.LUDDINGTON AND DODWELL WERE VERY IMPORTANT SETTLEMENTS IN THE PAST, AND BECAME A CIVIL PARISH IN 1704 TO HELP WITH THE LEVYING OF POOR RATES. DRAYTON IS SITUATED FURTHER ALONG THE ALCESTER ROAD,AND IS NOWADAYS MUCH SMALLER THAN IT USED TO BE.THE CAUSE OF DECLINE OF VILLAGES EG.DRAYTON,DODWELL CAN BE ATTRIBUTED TO THE BLACK DEATH 1348-49,FOLLOWED BY INCREASING ENCLOSURE OF LAND.DRAYTON WAS FORMERLY KNOWN AS DRAYTON PETOES AFTER THE PEYTO FAMILY WHO OCCUPIED THE MANOR THERE FROM ABOUT 1250-1487.ITS FORMER IMPORTANCE WAS DUE TO THE STONE QUARRY. LASTLY,CLIFFORD CHAMBERS OWES ITS ORIGINS TO THE BISHOP OF WORCESTER,A JOHN DE CLIFFORD,WHO IS REPUTED TO HAVE OWNED PROPERTY IN THE AREA,HENCE THE NAME "CLIFFORD CHAMBERS".
